definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lie in wait (Ar. 0’aruba be crafty, also 0’araba tie (a knot) Frey)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְאָרַב]] consec. De 19:11, Ju Jdg 21:20; :[[אָרָֽבְתִּי]] Job 31:9; [[אָֽרְבוּ]] Ps 59:4, La 4:19; Impf. [[יֶאֱרׂב]] Ps 10:9, Ps 10:9; [[יֶאֱרָׂבוּ]] Pr 1:18, Mic 7:2; [[וׇיְּ ֽאֶרְבוּ]] Ju Jdg 9:34, Jdg 16:2; [[נֶֽאֶרְבָה]] Pr 1:11; Imv. [[אֱרׂב]] Ju Jdg 9:32; Inf. [[אֱרָב־]] Pr 12:6; Pt. [[אׂרֵב]] Jos 8:2 + 11 t.; [[אוֹרֵב]] Jos 8:12 + 4 t.; [[אׂרְבִים]] Jos 8:4 + 2 t;—lie in wait (with hostile purpose), abs. Ju Jdg 9:32, Jdg 9:43 + Jdg 21:20, Job 31:9, Ps 10:9, Pr 7:12, Pr 23:28, 1Sa 22:8, 1Sa 22:13, La 3:10 (of bear, cf. Ps 10:9); c. inf. of purpose Ps 10:9; c. acc. [[דָּם]] ´[[א]] Pr 12:6; c. [[עַל]], and pers. against whom De 19:11, Ju Jdg 9:34; usually c. [[ל]] Mic 7:2, Ju Jdg 16:2, Ps 59:4, Pr 1:11, Pr 1:18, Pr 24:15, La 4:19 cf. Jos 8:2, Jos 8:4, Jos 8:14; Pt. as subst. = liers-in-wait (pl.) Ju Jdg 20:29; usually sg. coll. ambush Jos 8:2, Jos 8:12, Jos 8:14, Jos 8:19, Jos 8:21, Ju Jdg 16:9, Jdg 16:12, Jdg 20:33, Jdg 20:36, Jdg 20:37, Jdg 20:37, Jdg 20:38, Ezr 8:31; pl. of this sing. = ambuscades Je 51:12; sg. = place of lying-in-wait, ambush (loc. sense) Jos 8:7.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[זַיׇּרֶב]] [[בנחל]] (for [[וַיַּאֲרֶב]]) 1Sa 15:5 (cf. Dr Kö:i. 390; Ges-Kau:§ 68. 2 queries) but txt. dub.; cf. Ol:§ 237 b, & Klo, who prop. [[ויעבר בנחל]].
